Religion and Belief
organizations: Texas Assn of Private and Parochial Schools
lead_paragraph: A Texas high school athletics association that had refused to reschedule a basketball game involving an Orthodox Jewish day school announced it would adjust its scheduling policy.
snippet: A Texas high school athletics association that had refused to reschedule a basketball game involving an Orthodox Jewish day school announced it would adjust its scheduling policy.
